questions.1: Are there internal rules and policies in place for public procurement processes?

answers.no: No, such rules have not been developed {{percent}}% ({{count}} people)

first.mainTitle: EMPLOYEE'S DECLARATION OF POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST

documents2.mainTitle: Declaration on Potential Conflict of Interest of Related Persons
documents2.introText: I _________________________, as a related person in this declaration
documents2.purposeText: hereby declare the following information about potential conflicts of interest regarding myself and the employee (job candidate):
documents2.registrationInfo: Date and registration number of identified potential conflict of interest cases recorded in the Conflict of Interest Registry: 20___ year "___" "___________"; registry number № ______.

header.pinfl: Personal identification number (PINFL) of the individual associated with the employee
header.legalEntityName: Name of the legal entity associated with the employee
header.legalEntityInfo: Taxpayer identification number (TIN) of the legal entity associated with the employee
header.legalEntityInfoNote: Information about the size of shares in the authorized fund (charter capital) or whether they are a head or member of management bodies of the legal entity associated with the employee
header.relativeInfo: Information about the employee's close relative
